relation.text: 1676 . A true Narrative of the Sessions . This Sessions began
Wednesday , 28th of June ; on which day a great number of Malefactors were Arraigned and Tryed
years ( not above Fourteen ) yet it appeared
February last ; so that he was found
about Twelve Years of Age , newly come
June , being about the time when the Trained Bands of London went out
fires the Musquet at random into the Street , in the middle of the day
did not intend or imagine any hurt to any Creature , and expressing much sorrow for the same , as he did now
bought by him of a Thief and his wife at twelve shillings a dozen , within these three years
married neer Tame in Oxfordshire , and liv 'd with her several years
extended to the Facts for which they were then convicted , and now
brought into trouble as Accessaries were now
now in the same obstinacy , though several times importuned
